subject: Business
title: The Value Proposition Canvas
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Value Proposition Canvas.

hook.text: Your product has 50 features. Customers use three. You're solving problems they don't have.

buildup.text: The value proposition canvas maps customer jobs, pains, and gains against your product's offerings.

discovery.text: Fit happens when your pain relievers match their pains and your gain creators match their desired gains.

twist.text: Most startups design features they find exciting instead of features customers actually need.

climax.text: Slack didn't sell 'team messaging.' It sold 'less email.' The pain was what mattered.

punchline.text: Don't list what you built. Describe what pain you kill.

quiz.question: What does the value proposition canvas map?
options: Customer pains and gains against your product's offerings
